str2: Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To receive, accept, acknowledge. From para and dechomai; to accept near, i.e. Admit or delight in.
An accusation, charge. From kategoros; a complaint, i.e. Criminal charge.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).
Comparative of presbus; older; as noun, a senior; specially, an Israelite Sanhedrist or Christian 'presbyter'.
From ek; the exterior; figuratively aside from, besides.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.
Three. Or neuter tria a primary number; 'three'.
A witness (judicially) or figuratively (genitive case); by analogy, a 'martyr'.
